location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, Muscat Cove, on board the HC Cruizer Aurorato Francis Warden Chief Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is reporting that the mare presented to the late Andrew Jukes by Sa‘īd bin Sultān Āl Sa‘īd, the Imam of Muscat, was not exchanged by the broker, but the Imam himself. This was done in consequence of the mare's illness.
